name: v7.1.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Paste this snippet into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
# Set `repo_name = "io_bazel_rules_scala"` if you still need it.
bazel_dep(name = "rules_scala", version = "7.1.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_scala",  # Can be "io_bazel_rules_scala" if you still need it.
    sha256 = "5338511555719caa1625c2a7fcb64e367db0cf19dae1505c3f6af480d35605e9",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-7.1.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v7.1.2/rules_scala-v7.1.2.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Update maintainers by @simuons in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1766
* Add BCR presubmit checks to CI, bump versions by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1767
* soft_fail CI tasks, upgrade to rules_python-1.6.0 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1768
* Upgrade Scala to 3.7.3 (was 3.7.2) by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1769
* Expand `$(location)` and "Make variables" in `env` by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1771
* Bump dependency versions for `rules_scala` v7.1.2 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1772


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/compare/v7.1.1...v7.1.2

name: v7.1.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Paste this snippet into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
# Set `repo_name = "io_bazel_rules_scala"` if you still need it.
bazel_dep(name = "rules_scala", version = "7.1.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_scala",  # Can be "io_bazel_rules_scala" if you still need it.
    sha256 = "9909a643120536751cfbe3e5942e354ca6085c01bca8d23a0815ad3fa7c60b66",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-7.1.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v7.1.1/rules_scala-v7.1.1.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Fix BCR presubmit, update rules_python to 1.5.2 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1760
* Update Runfiles usage to fix BCR, bump versions by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1761
* Replace bazel_worker_java with bazel_worker_api by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1762
* expose build_ijar for scala_library by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1753
* fix: string + label concatenation error by @kczulko in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1764


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/compare/v7.1.0...v7.1.1

name: v7.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Paste this snippet into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
# Set `repo_name = "io_bazel_rules_scala"` if you still need it.
bazel_dep(name = "rules_scala", version = "7.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_scala",  # Can be "io_bazel_rules_scala" if you still need it.
    sha256 = "6a900a39bf643c5c9308c8200f9a61e27588dc54a67aa08fcfc798f25add4f7b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-7.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v7.1.0/rules_scala-v7.1.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* chore: update GH org in BCR metadata by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1737
* Fix last_green build after disable_autoloads flip by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1738
* Fix setup_scala_toolchains, clean up test scripts by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1742
* Upgrade Scala versions 3.7.0 -> 3.7.1 by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1746
* Check for 'deps' attr in scala_doc rule by @vinnybod in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1740
* Bump dependencies, update `release_prep.sh`, docs by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1745
* Fix custom `twitter_scrooge` toolchain breakages by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1747
* Fix Bazel 8.2.1 WORKSPACE builds, bump dev deps by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1748
* Add compiler source download integrity values by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1749
* Fix builds for Bazel >= 9.0.0-pre.20250714.1 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1754
* Bump dependency versions for `rules_scala` v7.1.0 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1755
* Simplify test_dependency_versions.sh by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1758
* Upgrade Scala 3.7 to 3.7.2 (was 3.7.1) by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1757
* Fix last_green w/bazel_worker_api rules_java 8.15 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1756

## New Contributors
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1737

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/compare/v7.0.0...v7.1.0

name: v7.0.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Paste this snippet into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
# Set `repo_name = "io_bazel_rules_scala"` if you still need it.
bazel_dep(name = "rules_scala", version = "7.0.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_scala",  # Can be "io_bazel_rules_scala" if you still need it.
    sha256 = "a4700d6e6cdf13cf85e29029ec998e2ec3ba94791606ec83d2c96e3c5b0aebed",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-7.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v7.0.0/rules_scala-v7.0.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Updated artifact versions with sha sums and scala versions by @lm1nrt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1597
* [bugfix] normalize paths to enable running external tests by @joeljeske in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1598
* Handle incorrect Scalac options and prevent printing ScalacWorker stacktraces by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1606
* Scala 3.4.3 support by @lm1nrt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1603
* extra javac opts should override default ones by @thomasbao12 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1613
* Add netrc support for downloading sources by @grepwood in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1609
* Fix Bazel 7 related protobuf build failures by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1620
* Bazel 7 compatibility updates by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1619
* Scala 3.5.0 support by @lm1nrt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1604
* Build against latest bazel version instead of last_green by @simuons in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1627
* Automated creating and updating scala_x_x.bzl repository files by @lm1nrt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1608
* Bump to com.google.protobuf:protobuf-java:4.28.2 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1624
* Update test scripts for Bzlmod compatibility by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1622
* Bump to rules_proto 6.0.2, separate protobuf 21.7 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1623
* Use custom repo rule to generate @scalafmt_default by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1626
* Update dependencyanalyzer3 for Scala 3.5 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1628
* Collect diagnostics in Scala 3 by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1611
* Update repo name handling for Bzlmod compatibility by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1621
* Catch Throwable in ExtraProtobufGenerator by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1630
* Add tools/sync-bazelversion.sh, commit results by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1629
* Add CommandLineParserAdapter for >=2.13.9 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1634
* Update latest Scala 2 and Scala 3 versions by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1636
* Create the `@scala_compiler_sources` repo by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1635
* Update to Scalafmt 3.8.3 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1631
* Fix `dt_patches/dt_patch_test.sh` for Scala 2.13.0 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1632
* Refactor `scripts/create_repository.py`, fix some issues by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1639
* Move Throwable catch to ExtraProtobufGenerator.run by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1637
* Port DependencyAnalyzer plugin to Scala 3 by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1640
* Make scala_xxx rules declare that they provide JavaInfo by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1643
* Refactor `scripts/create_repository.py`, improve efficiency and correctness, and bump Scalatest, protobuf-java, kind-projector by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1642
* Make every .bazelrc import the top level .bazelrc by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1644
* Pass rlocationpaths to Test Runner by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1645
* Clean `test_{runner,scalafmt_helper}`, add diagnostic env vars, and improve `test_cross_build` performance by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1646
* Bump ScalaPB, protoc-bridge, gRPC, and Guava deps, and add `ProtobufAdapter`s and `ScalaPBCodeGenerator` wrappers by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1648
* Toolchainize //scala:toolchain_type by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1633
* Replace apparent_repo_name with repo rule wrappers by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1650
* Add dt_patches/compiler_sources repo by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1654
* Bump protobuf-java to 4.29.0 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1655
* Extract `dev_deps_repositories()` from WORKSPACE and remove `//private` by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1656
* Fix windows Buildkit CI  by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1649
* Set latest Bazel build to 7.x after 8.0.0 release by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1671
* Add Scala 3.6.2 support by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1672
* Toolchainize all testing toolchains by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1653
* Move `rules_scala_dependencies` to scala/deps.bzl by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1660
* Toolchainize //scala/scalafmt:scalafmt_toolchain by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1678
* Upgrade Scala 3.6 to 3.6.3 by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1682
* Bump `protoc-bridge` to 0.9.8 for Scala >= 2.12 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1688
* Upgrade Scala 3 LTS to 3.3.5 by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1689
* Add Yobi.ai to adopters by @FrankPortman in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1683
* Throw a more informative error when scala_macro_library isn't used by @jadenPete in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1680
* Enable scala_macro_library targets to have dependencies by @jadenPete in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1681
* Toolchainize //scala_proto:{,deps_}toolchain_type by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1687
* Bump several Maven artifacts, Go by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1690
* Toolchainize //jmh/toolchain:jmh_toolchain_type by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1691
* refactor scalac java_binary target creation by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1677
* Toolchainize twitter_scrooge by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1693
* Use rctx.original_name if available, Go 1.23.6 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1694
* Bump Scalafmt from 3.8.3 to 3.8.6 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1692
* Remove @io_bazel_rules_scala or replace with Label by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1696
* Bump `rules_go`, Go, `proto-google-common-protos` by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1698
* Upgrade Scala 2.13 LTS to 2.13.16 by @bartoszkosiorek in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1700
* Fix scala_proto_library default outputs by @simuons in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1701
* Bump Scalafmt from 3.8.6 to 3.9.1 by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1708
* Fix `setup_scala_testing_toolchain()` classpaths by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1707
* Update docs for version 7.0.0, remove old APIs by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1703
* Rename `{io_bazel_,}rules_scala_config` by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1709
* 7.0.0 README updates and minor code changes by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1714
* Add `examples/overridden_artifacts` and test by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1713
* Upgrade Scala 3.6 to 3.6.4 by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1715
* Bazel 7 and MSVC compatible version updates by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1711
* Fix silently broken `test_version.sh` tests by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1716
* Bump Bazel, Scalafmt, Guava, sbt, gRPC, proto-java by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1720
* Add Java 24 compatibility by @srdo-humio in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1719
* Cleanup WorkerTest after SecurityManager was removed by @simuons in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1721
* feat: bit more configurable proto toolchain by @kczulko in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1718
* Bazel 8 + `rules_java` 8 updates, protoc toolchain by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1710
* Enable Bzlmod by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1722
* Add src/... to test_rules_scala, fix Windows break by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1724
* Bump Bazel, rules_*, Guava, Go, golang tools, etc. by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1727
* Remove `Label` wrappers for target string literals by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1728
* Replace `@scalafmt_default` with toolchains target by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1725
* Establish minimum compatible Bazel, dep versions by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1726
* Use the Publish to BCR reusable GitHub workflow by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1731
* Add toolchain options API to WORKSPACE and Bzlmod by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1730
* Bump dependency versions by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1732
* Add test_dependency_versions, update test_runner by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1729
* Add Scala 3.7.0 by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1733
* Add Airbnb as adopter by @thomasbao12 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1612
* Fix Scalafmt `default_config` docs for `WORKSPACE` by @mbland in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1734
* Upgrade Scala 3.3.5 -> 3.3.6 by @WojciechMazur in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1735
* Fixing release workflow by @simuons in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1736

## New Contributors
* @lm1nrt made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1597
* @joeljeske made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1598
* @WojciechMazur made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1606
* @thomasbao12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1613
* @grepwood made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1609
* @mbland made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1620
* @FrankPortman made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1683
* @jadenPete made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1680
* @bartoszkosiorek made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1700
* @kczulko made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/pull/1718

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_scala/compare/v6.6.0...v7.0.0

name: v6.6.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "e734eef95cf26c0171566bdc24d83bd82bdaf8ca7873bec6ce9b0d524bdaf05d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-6.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v6.6.0/rules_scala-v6.6.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* JacocoRunner script: update for Jacoco 0.8.11 and Bazel 7.0.2 by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1567
* Move default toolchain dependencies logic to .bzl file by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1561
* Allow version-aware naming for artifact repositories by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1562
* Provide `select_for_scala_version` utility macro by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1563
* Allow transitioning Scala version with `scala_version` attribute of rules by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1569
* Use version-aware naming for `scala_compiler_source` repository by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1560
* Don't rely on global `SCALA_VERSION` in BUILD files, use select instead by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1564
* Propagate maven_coordinates tag to generated scala_import so pom generation includes the dependency by @vinnybod in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1568
* Use version-aware naming for artifact repositories by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1573
* Download artifacts for all `SCALA_VERSIONS` by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1574
* Fix the remaining default providers in `setup_scala_toolchain` by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1577
* Semanticdb clear dir by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1580
* Build and register toolchains for all `SCALA_VERSIONS` by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1578
* Use JDK Throwable.printStackTrace by @srdo-humio in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1583
* Make scaladoc rule handle transient deps better (and add some tests) by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1584
* Allow configuring multiple Scala versions by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1579
* Add a few cross-build examples by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1587
* Tests with version-specific codes by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1586
* Documentation update after development of the cross-build by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1588
* Add scalafmt test with multiple Scala versions by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1589
* Check if java_runtime.version is available by @kmate-ct in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1591
* Make suffixed scala version config setting publicly visible by @kmate-ct in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1592

## New Contributors
* @vinnybod made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1568
* @kmate-ct made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1591

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/v6.5.0...v6.6.0

name: v6.5.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "3b00fa0b243b04565abb17d3839a5f4fa6cc2cac571f6db9f83c1982ba1e19e5",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-6.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v6.5.0/rules_scala-v6.5.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Support Scala 3.3.1 by @lukaszrola in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1542
* Added windows task to CI by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1536
* Bump scalafmt version by @mateuszkuta256 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1543
* Fix checksum io_bazel_rules_scala_scala_parallel_collections in Scala3.3 by @lukaszrola in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1544
* Remove binary artifacts due to security policy violation by @mateuszkuta256 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1538
* Use worker proto from @bazel_tools by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1330
* Fix to close the compiler object in scalacinvoker  by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1545
* Add VirtusLab as adopter by @romanowski in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1547
* Don't output unused dependency messages when compilation fails by @laurynaslubys in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1548
* Conditionally set -Djava.security.manager=allow for jdk >= 17 by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1555
* Handle the removal of to_proto and to_json from struct by @c-mita in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1554
* fix typo in example tests (Exmaple => Example) by @KevinBoyette in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1553
* Introduce `SCALA_VERSIONS` by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1557
* Introduce build setting for current Scala version by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1558
* Don't rely on `SCALA_VERSION` in phases by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1559
* Make scala_proto_aspect have "provides = [ScalaProtoAspectInfo]" by @timothyg-stripe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1549
* Make scrooge_*_aspect have "provides = [ScroogeAspectInfo]" by @timothyg-stripe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1565
* Build with JDK 21 by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1556
* Bind toolchains to Scala version by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1566

## New Contributors
* @lukaszrola made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1542
* @mateuszkuta256 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1543
* @romanowski made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1547
* @c-mita made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1554
* @KevinBoyette made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1553
* @aszady made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1557
* @timothyg-stripe made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1549

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/v6.4.0...v6.5.0

name: v6.4.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "9a23058a36183a556a9ba7229b4f204d3e68c8c6eb7b28260521016b38ef4e00",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-6.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v6.4.0/rules_scala-v6.4.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* doc: Register proto toolchain for simple usage by @honnix in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1531
* Use tagged Rules Scala release in README.md by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1533
* Add jdk toolchain type to proto rules by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1534
* Change SemanticdbInfo.plugin_jar from string to File by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1530
* Fix diagnostic outputs for Scala 2.12.13 by @aishfenton in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1532
* Make tests pass on Windows by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1529

## New Contributors
* @honnix made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1531
* @aishfenton made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1532

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/v6.3.0...v6.4.0

body:
## Using WORKSPACE

```starlark
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-5.1.0",

)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Bump jmh version: 1.20 -> 1.36 by @dkomanov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1466
* Fix external name in workspace snippet by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1469
* Tracking implicit compiler dependencies by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1459
* Add exec transition to scala_test _lcov_merger by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1474
* Update release workflow with a stable archive by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1473
* Add support for Scala 3.2 by @meisam in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1465
* Fix dead link in readme by @hanneskaeufler in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1476
* Update rule dependencies by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1478
* Fixing JacocoRunner building script for Jacoco by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1485
* Catch macro expansion exceptions in ScalacWorker by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1489
* Improve scala_config() documentation in README.md by @kolotyluk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1494
* Handle StackOverflowError in macros by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1491
* Allow user to provide scalac source jar for "ast-plus" dependency tracking feature by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1493
* Mark unused deps as ignored for mixed source targets by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1499
* Replace relative paths to ../ with external/ by @prebeta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1500
* Add support for Scala 3.3 LTS by @csubj in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1501
* For Windows: Fix to enable scala_test and scala_binary outputs to be executed on Windows by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1502
* Make DepsTrackingReporter handle Windows path separators by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1503
* call close() on compiler in scalacWorker after each job by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1504
* Register java toolchain inside rules_scala by @kotlaja in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1505

## New Contributors
* @thirtyseven made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1474
* @meisam made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1465

* @csubj made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1501
* @crt-31 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1502
* @kotlaja made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1505

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/v5.0.0...v5.1.0

name: v5.0.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "141a3919b37c80a846796f792dcf6ea7cd6e7b7ca4297603ca961cd22750c951",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-5.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/archive/refs/tags/v5.0.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Add initial repositories for Scala 3.1 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1342
* Update buildkite jobs by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1345
* Fix org_typelevel__cats_core checksum for 2.13 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1346
* Tweaks to `scalafmt` rules/script to support `bazel test` wrappers by @virusdave in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1344
* update default `scalafmt` phase order; place before `runfiles` by @virusdave in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1347
* Fix Bazel latest and 5.0.0 Buildkite jobs by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1348
* Update latest Bazel build to latest green head build by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1349
* Update scrooge support code to compile with Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1350
* Update scripts workers to be compatible with Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1352
* Update scalac opts in test reporter to support Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1353
* Update jmh support to be compatible with Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1351
* Update scalafmt worker to be compatible with Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1354
* Scala 3 minimal support by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1355
* Move ScalaTest deps to its own repository macro by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1356
* Clean up versions tests by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1357
* set -e for ctx.actions.run_shell commands by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1360
* Fix deprecation warning in ScalaPBWorker by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1367
* Scalatest version bump to 3.2.9 by @justinass-wix in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1368
* Use java_common.stamp_jar to stamp scala_import jar by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1372
* Justinass/dep analyzer by @justinass-wix in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1370
* Allow per-target java runtime selection for scala_junit_tests by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1373
* Single-jar pack_sources should conform to Bazel behavior by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1378
* Take --instrumentation_filter into account in coverage phase by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1377
* Add runtime_jdk to scala_binary by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1380
* Create jdeps output from classpath entries by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1376
* Allow `scala_junit_tests` targets to specify test environment variables by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1384
* Consistent argsfile parsing by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1385
* Revert "Create jdeps output from classpath entries (#1376)" by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1388
* Use a public java_compile_toolchain attr instead of _java_toolchain by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1389
* scala_doc: Use param file to build scaladocs by @rahuliyer95 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1390
* Expose `_source_jars` output group in `scala_import` by @Duhemm in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1394
* JacocoRunner script: update for Bazel 5.0+ by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1399
* feat: added support for inherited_environment in scala_test rule by @omerlh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1401
* Fix JacocoInstrumenter compilation with JDK 13+ by @dmivankov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1402
* scala_doc: Export ScaladocAspectInfo to allow users to build custom scaladoc aspects by @rahuliyer95 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1404
* Fix rules_scala JDK lookup when using --nolegacy_external_runfiles. by @srdo-humio in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1397
* Declare non-windows executable with .sh extension by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1407
* Put -s in front of other parameters for the ScalaTest runner. by @srdo-humio in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1412
* Fix aspect test to recognize `@//` labels by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1417
* Fix test_scala_proto_library to accept @-prefixed labels by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1418
* Make 5.3.1 minimal supproted version by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1423
* Cleanup Bazel 5.2 test by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1426
* Allow scala_benchmark_jmh to specify a runtime_jdk version by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1424
* Update Coverage test data to Bazel 5.3.1 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1427
* Test examples with Bazel 5.3.1 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1428
* docs: fix broken links by @tanishiking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1429
* fix: enable to override JAVABIN of wrapper script by @tanishiking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1432
* Extract scalacopts phase by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1435
* Suppress warning and enable to use dependency_tracking with `-Werror` by @tanishiking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1433
* Validate repository Scala version against scala_config by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1436
* Fix setup guide in readme by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1444
* Revert "Declare non-windows executable with .sh extension" by @ittaiz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1446
* Update example Rules Scala setup macros by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1438
* Update Rules Scala commit in README instructions by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1447
* java_stub_template to use argument file instead of classpath jar by @ittaiz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1410
* Fix resource priority under name collision by @tanishiking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1456
* add tagged release workflow using github actions by @jvandew in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1452
* Simplify setup of scala_toolchain and its deps by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1439
* Add setup testing toolchain macro by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1451
* phase_merge_jars: refactor to separate function that merges jars to o… by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1403
* Fix toolchain type reference by @tgeng in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1460
* Update to be removed "host" cfg to "exec" by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1462
* Replace zipper with singlejar by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1463

## New Contributors
* @virusdave made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1344
* @justinass-wix made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1368
* @wiwa made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1373
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1377
* @Duhemm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1394
* @omerlh made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1401
* @dmivankov made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1402
* @srdo-humio made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1397
* @Wyverald made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1417
* @tanishiking made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1429
* @jvandew made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1452
* @tgeng made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1460

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/20220201...v5.0.0

name: Tag master as of 2022-02-01
body:
```
http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/20220201/rules_scala-20220201.zip",
    type = "zip",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-20220201",
    sha256 = "77a3b9308a8780fff3f10cdbbe36d55164b85a48123033f5e970fdae262e8eb2",
)
```

name: Last version containing tut_rule
body:
### Motivation
`tut` is no longer supported (even binaries are not available), therefore `tut` related code was removed from `rules_scala`.

This release contains a separate workspace (downloadable as `http_archive`) with removed `tut_rule`, so you could use that rule with later `rule_scala` versions (but it won't be supported).

### Migration

#### workspace
```
http_archive(
    name = "tut_rule",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/tut/tut_rule.zip",
    strip_prefix = "tut_rule",
)

load("@tut_rule//:tut.bzl", "tut_dependencies")

tut_dependencies()
```

#### build
Replace `load("//tut_rule:tut.bzl", "scala_tut_doc")` with `load("@tut_rule//:tut.bzl", "scala_tut_doc")`

name: Test detection and XML output edition
body:
This release requires bazel 0.2.1.

The main new features are:
- add an XML test formatter that writes junit XML results where bazel wants them #24 
- pass the JAVACMD to scalac so the java environment from bazel is used #19 
- fix a bug with resources not adding all items #17 
- deprecate using explicit suites in tests, autodetection of scalatests should work #7
- support empty srcs to allow scala_library with only exports and runtime_deps #5 

thanks to @johnynek @smparkes @dinowernli and @avibryant for contributions to this release.
